attributes.action: join the people of Plymouth in opposing the potential privatisation of Plymouth's publicly owned bus company, Citybus, by Plymouth City Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Leader of Plymouth City Council has announced she wants to spend taxpayers' money investigating whether the Council should sell some or all of its shares in Plymouth's bus company, Plymouth CityBus, effectively privatising the city's bus company. We believe that Plymouth CityBus should remain publicly owned, believe the drivers, mechanics and staff of CityBus do Plymouth proud and call upon the Prime Minister to do all he can to prevent the City Council from selling this essential public service.
